page.title: 09A DAY IN OUR LIVES (PARENTS)
page.content: { {JUNE 24th 1985. { {Monday morning I got up at 7.30 A.M.to {feed the baby.Today he is eight {months old.How time flies,while {feeding Gary Tracey and my husband {had thier breakfasts.At 8 A.M. my {mother arived to help me with my {chores. By 9.30 Tracey had gone to {school and my husband had gone to {work. I got the baby ready and my {mother and I walked down to the {shopping centre.After buying the {groceries for that day we walked back {home to prepare lunch. {That afternoon I had a visit from my {cousin and her daughter. At 5 p.m. I {made dinner,got the baby to bed and {sat down to watch T.V. untill bedtime. {This is a normal day in my life. { } Helen Booth.
